channel.title: Genuitec
channel.description: Code anything from anywhere with anyone

item.title: Evolving Together: A New Chapter in Our Collaboration with CodeTogether
item.dc:creator: wayne
item.description: Today, we’re happy to announce the next evolution in our journey with CodeTogether.

item.title: Copilot4Eclipse – GitHub Copilot for Eclipse and MyEclipse
item.dc:creator: wayne
item.description: Learn about Copilot4Eclipse (Copilot for Eclipse), a free Eclipse plugin that enables developers to seamlessly use GitHub Copilot AI coding assistance directly within their Eclipse and MyEclipse IDEs.

item.title: Copilot4Eclipse—Welcome to the Future of Coding in Eclipse
item.dc:creator: wayne
item.description: Genuitec announces the upcoming release of Copilot4Eclipse. Copilot4Eclipse is a first of its kind Eclipse plugin that enables developers to seamlessly use GitHub Copilot AI coding assistance directly within their Eclipse IDE.

item.title: MyEclipse 2023.1: Jakarta EE 10, Angular 16 and Beyond!
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: Check out all the new features in MyEclipse 2023: Jakarta EE 10, Java 20, Spring 6 & Spring Boot 3, Qute Templates, Hibernate 6 and much more!

item.title: MyEclipse 2022.1 – Jakarta EE 9 and Vue in Eclipse + More!
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: MyEclipse 2022.1 is live with Jakarta EE 9 & Vue support in Eclipse. Also, Apple Silicon and Java 17 support with integrated IDE live share

item.title: CodeTogether 2022.1—Blazing Fast Content Assist & Extensive Scalability
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 2022.1—Enhancements to the core coding and collaboration experience, plus a new multi-server deployment option for on-premises!

item.title: CVE-2021-44228 and Genuitec
item.dc:creator: timwebb
item.description: An internal audit confirms Genuitec does not use log4j2 on our servers and is not impacted by the CVE-2021-44228 vulnerability.

item.title: CodeTogether 5.0.1—FIXES, Fixes, fixes
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 5.0.1 is a maintenance release with improvements to core areas like simultaneous typing and content assist.

item.title: CodeTogether 5 with Audio & Video
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 5 now includes integrated communication tools including audio, video, screen sharing, text chat and polls.

item.title: CodeTogether 5 with Audio & Video—Sneak Peek
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 5 with audio and video calling, text chat and screen sharing is coming soon! Here's a sneak peek.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.2—Write/Run Tests for TDD and Extreme Free Usage
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 4.2 now available! Run remote unit tests and remote launches from the host. On-premises customers get a metrics dashboard.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.2 with Test Running—Sneak Peek
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 4.2 with Test Running is coming soon! Here's a sneak peek.

item.title: CodeTogether 4.1.2—Summer Refresh
item.dc:creator: Brian Fernandes
item.description: CodeTogether 4.1.2 is now available with fixes for content assist and remote development in VS Code, support for Oracle IDCS and Keycloak as SSO providers, and other fixes in SSO support.
